context.name: Sean Barber
context.bio: Sean is a Senior majoring in Computer Science. He is a member of the track and field team where he competes in the 200 and 400 meter dash. Over the summer he interned for JPMorgan Chase in their software engineer program. He enjoys being a member of Flames Consulting Group because it broadens his horizons for consulting and leadership.
